messages.content: Can you help me make a funny Christmas gift image that has a toilet with a sink in the back tank in the center with words around it - aren’t you glad I didn’t get you a toilet. Text should say merry Christmas Josephine - I got her a book of rumi poetry instead

{"prompt":"A humorous Christmas-themed image featuring a modern toilet with a sink integrated into the back tank, placed prominently in the center. The design includes festive elements like holiday lights, ornaments, and a soft glow. Surrounding the toilet are playful, handwritten-style words: 'Aren’t you glad I didn’t get you a toilet?' Below this text, in a festive font, 'Merry Christmas Josephine - I got her a book of Rumi poetry instead' is written. The overall color scheme is cheerful with reds, greens, and golds, creating a whimsical holiday vibe.","size":"1024x1024"}
